content: उपयुज् {c7c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To use, employ, apply; षाड्गुण्यमुपयुंजीत <ls>Śi. 2. 93</ls>; षडुपायुंक्त समीक्ष्य तत्फलं <ls>R. 8. 21</ls>; <ls>M. 5. 12</ls>; अनुपयुज्यमान useless, good for nothing <ls>Ś. 7</ls>; <ls>U. 4.</ls> {@--2@} To enjoy, taste; पय उपयुज्य <ls>Me. 13</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab>; फलान्युपायुंक्त स दंडनीतेः <ls>R. 18. 46</ls>; <ls>Bk. 8. 39.</ls> {@--3@} To devote or attach oneself to; न मृगैरुपयुज्यते is not loved <ls>Pt. 2. 22</ls>; न वै प्राज्ञा गतश्रीकं भर्तारमुपयुंजते <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls> {@--4@} To yoke or harness (as horses to a carriage). {@--5@} To appropriate, consume, eat; <ls>Ms. 8. 40.</ls> {%--<ab>pass.</ab>%} {@--1@} To be used or applied. {@--2@} To be fit or proper; तस्येयमुपयुज्यते <ls>Bhāg.</ls> {@--3@} To be of use, be taken into account; <ls>Pt. 1. 328.</ls>
